title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reflects on when the Golden State Warriors have needed to turn on the juice at critical times after a lull in a long series. Also, what to do with the Los Angeles Lakers' Russell Westbrook and should the Laker brass even care what LeBron James thinks about what they eventually do with Westbrook? Plus, the "NIL isn't sustainable" crowd is tiring Colin out. Colin argues that NIL is sustainable but does need some guardrails. Toronto Raptors head coach Nick Nurse stops by to share his opinions on reducing blowouts that have become a pattern in the postseason, the best scoring addition to help Luka Doncic in the future, the Celtics' sturdy defense, his life in Toronto, and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
